author: Charlie Campbell / Shanghai
title: Wuhan Has Reopened After a Brutal Coronavirus Lockdown. But Is China Ready?
description: To believe Chinese officials, the embattled people of Wuhan, the original epicenter of the coronavirus pandemic, are “heroes,” whose stoicism during almost 11 weeks of arduous lockdown helped save countless lives by containing the spread of the disease. Yet n…
content:
